channel.description: Most programming languages have multiple ways to represent numbers. In particular, they make a distinction between (integers in mathematics) and those with a decimal point (called rational numbers in mathematics). The reason is that way we encode these values in binary is different. While we donâ€™t really need to understand the full details of this encoding, we do need to understand their implications Integers In mathematics, integers are simply whole numbers - ones without a fractional part, i.
